languages.text: "Поговорим о Лекс Империалис. Мне интересно, как ты трактуешь его суть".
"Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."
languages.original_text: "Поговорим о Лекс Империалис. Мне интересно, как ты трактуешь его суть".

traits.locale_text: "Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."
"Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."
"Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."
"Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."
"Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."
"Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."

languages.text: 「レックス・インペリアについてもっと話そう。君がその本質をどう理解しているのかを知りたい」
languages.original_text: "Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."

traits.locale_text: 「レックス・インペリアについてもっと話そう。君がその本質をどう理解しているのかを知りたい」

languages.text: "Lasst uns über das Lex Imperia reden. Ich möchte wissen, wie Ihr seine Essenz interpretiert."
languages.original_text: "Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst uns über das Lex Imperia reden. Ich möchte wissen, wie Ihr seine Essenz interpretiert."

languages.text: « Parlons de la Lex Imperialis. J'aimerais savoir comment vous interprétez son essence. »
languages.original_text: "Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."

traits.locale_text: « Parlons de la Lex Imperialis. J'aimerais savoir comment vous interprétez son essence. »

languages.text: «Hablemos de la Lex Imperialis. Siento curiosidad por cómo interpreta usted su esencia».
languages.original_text: "Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."

traits.locale_text: «Hablemos de la Lex Imperialis. Siento curiosidad por cómo interpreta usted su esencia».

languages.text: “咱们来聊聊帝国律法吧，我很想了解你如何看待它的本质。”
languages.original_text: "Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."

traits.locale_text: “咱们来聊聊帝国律法吧，我很想了解你如何看待它的本质。”

languages.text: "Lex İmperialis'ten konuşalım. Özünü nasıl yorumladığını merak ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Let us talk about the Lex Imperialis. I am curious to know how you interpret its essence."

traits.locale_text: "Lex Imperialis hakkında konuşalım. Özünü nasıl yorumladığını merak ediyorum."
